titleStmt.title: Little Miami & Columbus & Xenia Railroad Company

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: Little Miami & Columbus & Xenia Railroad Company

body.p: Railroad and company in Ohio. Little Miami Railroad Company operated from 1836. Columbus and Xenia Railroad Company operated from 1844. Partnership of two companies formed in 1853.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Joint Annual Report of the Directors to the Stockholders of the Little Miami and Columbus & Xenia Railroad Companies, (Cincinnati: Gazette Company Steam Printing House, 1862)1-2.
Thirty -Eighth Annual Report of the Commissioner of Railroads and Telegraphs to the Governor of the State of Ohio (Springfield, OH: The Springfield Publishing Company, State Printers, 1906), 57.
